member.summary: If you can see profiles as an authorized user.

member.summary: Creates an instance of a Scraper.

member.name: M:VkLibrary.Scraper.GetPhotos(System.Int32)
member.remarks: To get all photos call the mothod until LoadMore is false.
member.returns: LoadMore - is there any photos to load, Urls - list of urls.

member.summary: Gets the list of user's friends.

member.name: M:VkLibrary.Scraper.GetSubscribers(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets list of subscribers. To get all subscribers call the method until LoadMore is false.
member.returns: LoadMore - is there any subscribers to load, Subscribers - list of subscribers.
